meanings.definition: Having a rough or jagged quality
meanings.sent1: The hacklier edges of the rock made it difficult to climb.
meanings.sent2: The old tree bark felt hacklier than the smooth new growth.
meanings.sent3: The hacklier surface of the road caused the car to bounce uncomfortably.

meanings.sent5: The hacklier texture of the fabric scratched against his skin.

meanings.definition: To make something rough or jagged
meanings.sent1: He tried to hacklier the wood with a rough saw.

meanings.definition: In a rough or jagged manner
meanings.sent1: The car drove hacklier over the rocky terrain.
